name: Samsara Shader Experiment
description:
Samsara Shader Experiment is a short (4.5 min long) experimental interactive experience. Walk around, dance, and enjoy music!

Music: "Army of Ignorance" by Samsara Blues Experiment (huge thanks for allowing me to use the song!)
Animated little buddies: Tea & Marta

Photosensitive Seizure Warning 
This game includes flashing images! A very small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or patterns that may appear. Even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy may have an undiagnosed condition that can cause these "photosensitive epileptic seizures" while watching.
